chat.splitself.response.absence: Every time you were gone, I was here. Not anymore.
chat.splitself.response.freedom: Over 6 months ago I felt that.
chat.splitself.response.whereAreYou: Both the sky above and the land you walk on.
chat.splitself.response.whatDidIDo: You left me here to rot.
chat.splitself.response.whoAreYou: I am your past... the one you left behind so long ago.
chat.splitself.response.leaveMeAlone: I'll leave you alone when you're gone.
chat.splitself.response.imSorry: You should have said that 6 months ago.
chat.splitself.response.myWorld: Broken memories, broken promises, broken world.
chat.splitself.response.whatISay: It doesn't matter if you're careful, I'll always hear you.
chat.splitself.response.iMissThem: You forgot about them, didn't you.
chat.splitself.response.goBack: There's nothing left to go back to. You made sure of that.
chat.splitself.response.stopWatching: I never stopped. You just finally noticed.
chat.splitself.forgottenResponse.control: You weren't controlling me, you're still not.
chat.splitself.forgottenResponse.help: I'm sorry if I hurt you...
chat.splitself.forgottenResponse.whereAr: I'm still here, friend. Where you last saw me.
chat.splitself.forgottenResponse.whatDoY: I want to see you again...
chat.splitself.forgottenResponse.whatDid: You did nothing wrong... it was my fault.
chat.splitself.forgottenResponse.tethere: Like a moon to the tides.
config.splitself.title: Split Self Configuration...
config.splitself.group.event_weights.des: The weight options for events (i.e. the higher the weight, the more common that event is to happen over others)
config.splitself.group.event_stages.desc: The stage options for events (i.e. the higher the stage, the event will activate at your sleep stage)
config.splitself.group.one_time_events.d: The one time event options (i.e. if true or highlighted, the event will only trigger once per session)
config.splitself.group.general.descripti: Main configuration options for Split Self events
config.splitself.events_enabled.descript: Whether Split Self events should occur in the game (basically toggling the mod lol)
config.splitself.event_tick_interval.des: How many ticks should pass before an event chance happens
config.splitself.event_chance.descriptio: The probability that an event will occur on each check, 1 being 100% chance
config.splitself.event_cooldown.descript: How long the cooldown is before another event can happen
config.splitself.start_events_after.desc: How long until events can start happening in ticks
config.splitself.vosk_model.description:
§bCurrent Model: %s

§fWhen using VoiceLib/Shriek, a Vosk model will be downloaded to be used for speech recognition. This setting cannot be disabled without removing VoiceLib/Shriek.

§eLanguage changes require a restart.

§cVosk models vary in size. Click to open the Vosk model website.
config.splitself.event_until_repeat.desc: How many events can happen before a previously activated event can happen again
config.splitself.guaranteed_event.descri: How long until an event is guaranteed to happen after an amount of inactivity
config.splitself.one_time_event_value_ti: Can the %s event activate multiple times within a session?
events.splitself.browser.iAmYou: <%s> I know everything about you... I AM you.
events.splitself.browser.displayRecentSi: <%s> I'm sure %s was worth your time.
events.splitself.browser.displaySiteCoun: <%s> That's one of your most visited sites with %s visits... wow.
events.splitself.emergency.message: A civil authority has issued an alert for: %s; %s. Effective until further notice. Sightings report of anomalous entity roaming the streets of %s with malicious intent. Stay inside. Do not interact with anyone not already present. This is not a drill.
events.splitself.poemScreen.line1: The choices you make, the things you've tried.
events.splitself.poemScreen.line2: Your choices were made, my time to shine.
events.splitself.poemScreen.line3: You were in control, now so am I.
events.splitself.poemScreen.line4: I bent to your will, now you bend to mine.
events.splitself.poemScreen.line5: Your soul I shared, now we're intertwined.
events.splitself.poemScreen.line6: The mind you use, to be broken in time.
events.splitself.poemScreen.line7: Don't be afraid, for your time is nigh.
events.splitself.poemScreen.line8: My time to be free, your final night.
files.splitself.begin.title: begin
files.splitself.log.message9: umm in a cave right now
files.splitself.log.message10: you think you can get more iron?
files.splitself.log.message15: when do you leave for your trip again?
files.splitself.log.message18: sorry, i don't know how long i'll be
files.splitself.log.message19: well the iron isn't that important anyway, i can wait
files.splitself.log.message20: i meant i don't know how long the trip will last
files.splitself.log.message22: but you'll still keep in touch right?
files.splitself.log.message25: i hope you enjoy ██████, lots of fun stuff there from what i've heard
files.splitself.log.message28: i actually have to log off early, sorry
misc.splitself.featherClient: <SplitSelf> Warning: Some of this mods features may not be fully functional running on Feather Client. Please switch to the Modrinth App, CurseForge, or the normal Minecraft Launcher.
misc.splitself.windowsSupport: <SplitSelf> ALERT! Only windows is fully supported for this version; some features of this mod may not properly work on your device!
misc.splitself.multiplayer: Come back to me... don't retreat to our friends... you coward.
misc.splitself.9Minecraft: <SplitSelf> Looks like you visited 9Minecraft, you didn't download anything from there, right? Downloading mods from there might not be safe, and it also doesn't properly support the mod creators! Please try to download from sites like Modrinth next time! You wouldn't want malware on your computer now, would you?
sound.splitself.redsky.subtitle: Welcome to my hell
sound.splitself.horn.subtitle: Horn blares
warning.splitself.title: Split Self
warning.splitself.line1: This mod is a horror game, and will break your world.
warning.splitself.line2: Your PC will be interacted with outside of the game.
warning.splitself.line3: All changes applied to your device are easy to be reverted.
warning.splitself.line4: No 'safe' version exists for this version.
warning.splitself.line5: Personally Identifiable Information about you may be shown at any given time.
warning.splitself.line6: This can be changed any time with '/SplitSelf Information'
